stories.text: Arist's upcoming launch of their v2.0 platform and pricing model on Apr. 2 seems to price out anyone but enterprise clients. Any suggestions for a competitor that I should I consider migrating to? Key selling points for Arist for my use case was the spaced SMS delivery, user-defined delivery times and the basic analytics for participation.
